abilities.name: None
abilities.description: This is a template ability; it doesn't do anything.

abilities.name: Riposte
abilities.description: If you can roll a hit, you can nullify a second attack the enemy makes against a friendly unit.

abilities.name: Sword Prowess Lv 1
abilities.description: Grants Hit +5, Avo +7, and Crit Avo +5 when using a sword.

abilities.description: Grants Hit +10, Avo +20, and Crit Avo +10 when using a sword.

abilities.name: Axebreaker
abilities.description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using an sword against axe users.

abilities.name: Attack of Opportunity
abilities.description: If an enemy was within 1 space of you at the start of the enemy phase and that enemy moves out of that space, you may make an attack against that enemy.

abilities.name: Swordbreaker

abilities.description: If you can roll a hit, you decrease an enemy’s ATK or DEF by 5.

abilities.name: Defiant Strength
abilities.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25%, Grants Strength +8.

abilities.name: Defiant Magic
abilities.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25%, Grants Magic +8.

abilities.name: Defiant Speed
abilities.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25%, Grants Speed +8.

abilities.name: Defiant Resistance
abilities.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25%, Grants Resistance +8.

abilities.name: Defiant Defense
abilities.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25%, Grants Defense +8.

abilities.name: Defiant Avoid
abilities.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25%, Grants Avoid +30.

abilities.name: Defiant Critical
abilities.description: At start of turn, if unit's HP ≤ 25%, Grants Critical +50.

abilities.name: Death Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Str +6 during combat.

abilities.name: Fiendish Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Magic +6 during combat.

abilities.name: Darting Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants AS +6 during combat.

abilities.name: Armored Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Def +6 during combat.

abilities.name: Warding Blow
abilities.description: When user triggers the battle, grants Resistance +20

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description: Allies within 1 space inflict +3 damage in combat.

abilities.name: Seal Defense
abilities.description: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Def -6 for 1 turn after combat.

abilities.name: Seal Resistance
abilities.description: If unit damages foe during combat, foe suffers Res -6 for 1 turn after combat.

abilities.name: Heartseeker
abilities.description: If foes is within a 1-space radius, grants foes Avoid -20

abilities.name: Tomebreaker
abilities.description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when brawling against magic users.

abilities.name: Bowbreaker
abilities.description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using magic against bow users.

abilities.name: Fistbreaker
abilities.description: Grants Hit/Avo +20 when using a bow against brawlers.

abilities.name: Fire
abilities.description: Grants access to Fire. If unit has already learned Fire, mulitplies its uses per battle by 2x.

abilities.name: Miasma
abilities.description: Grants access to Miasma. If unit has already learned Miasma, mulitplies its uses per battle by 2x.

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description: Grants access to Heal. If unit has already learned Heal, multiplies its uses per battle by 2×.

abilities.name: Renewal
abilities.description: Unit recovers up to 20% of max HP at the start of each turn.

abilities.name: Poison Strike
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat and lands a hit, targeted foe loses up to 20% of max HP after combat.

abilities.name: Lifetaker
abilities.description: Unit recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt after defeating a foe.

abilities.name: Lethality
abilities.description: Chance to instantly kill a foe when dealing damage.

abilities.name: Poison
abilities.description: Chance to inflict poison on a foe when dealing damage.

abilities.name: Pavise
abilities.description: Chance to reduce sword/lance/axe/brawling damage by half.

abilities.name: Aegis
abilities.description: Chance to reduce bow/magic damage by half.

abilities.name: Miracle
abilities.description: Chance to survive lethal damage with 1 HP, if HP is > 1.

abilities.name: Terrain Resistance
abilities.description: Nullifies damage from terrain.

abilities.name: Special Dance
abilities.description: When using the Dance ability, grant Dex/Spd to target ally.

abilities.name: Vantage
abilities.description: If foe initiates combat, and if HP is ≤ 50%, unit still attacks first

abilities.name: Desperation
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 50%, unit’s follow-up attack (if possible) occurs before foe’s counterattack.

abilities.name: Quick Riposte
abilities.description: If Unit's HP ≥ 50%, if attacked by a foe, treats unit's Attack Speed as 4 higher than the foe's, granting the unit a follow up attack and denying the enemy's.

abilities.name: Wrath
abilities.description: If foe initiates combat while unit’s HP is ≤ 50%, grants Crit +50.

abilities.name: Dance
abilities.description: Use Dance to allow an ally to move again.

abilities.name: Steal
abilities.description: Allows unit to steal a non-weapon item form a foe with a lower Spd stat.

abilities.name: Locktouch
abilities.description: Allows the user to open normal doors and chests without keys

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: Enemies can't target the user if an ally not possessing stealth is in range.

abilities.name: Canto
abilities.description: After performing an action, user can user their leftover movement.

abilities.name: Pass
abilities.description: Move through enemy spaces.

abilities.name: Bowrange +1
abilities.description: Maximum Bow range +1

abilities.name: Bowrange +2
abilities.description: Maximum Bow range +2

abilities.description: Maximum anima magic range +1

abilities.description: Maximum dark magic range +1

abilities.description: Maximum light magic range +1

abilities.name: Unarmed Combat
abilities.description: User is able to fight barehandedly.

abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for anima magic by 2

abilities.name: Dark Magic Uses x2
abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for dark magic by 2

abilities.name: Light Magic Uses x2

abilities.name: Light Magic Heal +5
abilities.description: Adds 5 additional HP when healing with light magic.

abilities.name: Light Magic Heal +10
abilities.description: Adds 10 additional HP when healing with light magic.

abilities.name: Unsealable Magic
abilities.description: Prevents unit from being silenced.

abilities.name: Immune Status
abilities.description: Nullifies status effects and debuffs.

abilities.name: General
abilities.description: Nullifies instant death effects.

abilities.name: Commander
abilities.description: Nullifies instant death effects, status effects, and movement effects.

abilities.name: Infinite Magic
abilities.description: Removes the limitation on the number of times magic can be used.

abilities.name: Magic Bind
abilities.description: If the unit lands a hit, targeted foe is unable to use magic for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Infantry Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against infantry units.

abilities.name: Armored Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against armored units.

abilities.name: Cavalry Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against cavalry units.

abilities.name: Flying Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against flying units.

abilities.name: Dragon Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against dragons.

abilities.name: Monster Effect Null
abilities.description: Nullifies any extra effectiveness against monsters.

abilities.name: Effect Null
abilities.description: Cancels all types of effectiveness.

abilities.name: Vital Defense
abilities.description: Makes critical hits against this unit impossible.

abilities.name: Giant Wings
abilities.description: Grants Avoid +30 against sword, lance, and axe users.

abilities.name: Anti-magic Armor
abilities.description: Nullifies damage from magical attacks.

abilities.name: Noncombatant
abilities.description: Unit cannot be targetted by foes.

abilities.name: Cursed Power
abilities.description: Unit recovers HP on swamp terrain.

abilities.name: Anchor
abilities.description: Prevents unit from being moved.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.description: Allows unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

abilities.name: Counterattack
abilities.description: Allows unit to counterattack regardless of distance to attacker.

abilities.name: Anima Magic Uses x4
abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for anima magic by 4

abilities.name: Dark Magic Uses x4
abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for dark magic by 4

abilities.name: Light Magic Uses x4
abilities.description: Multiplies the number of uses for light magic by 4

abilities.name: Alert Stance
abilities.description: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Avo +15 for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Alert Stance+
abilities.description: If unit takes no action except Wait, grants Avo +30 for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Agarthan Technology
abilities.description: Adjacent foes deal 3 less damage during combat.

abilities.name: Lucky Seven
abilities.description: Each turn, grants +5 to one of the following stats: Str, Mag, Spd, Def, Res, Hit, or Avo.

abilities.name: Transmute
abilities.description: If unit is hit with a magic attack during enemy phase, grants +3 to all stats until next player phase ends.

abilities.name: Duelist's Blow
abilities.description: Grants Avoid +20 when user triggers battle.

abilities.name: Uncanny Blow
abilities.description: If unit initiates combat, grants Hit Rate +30 during combat.

abilities.name: Combat Medic
abilities.description: Unit's knowledge of anatomy grants Crit +10 when attacking with light or dark magic.

abilities.name: Can't Keep Up?
abilities.description: If the user hits with an attack, grants Spd +3 and Str +3 until damaged. Can only activate once per turn.

abilities.name: Try Your Best
abilities.description: Allies within 1 space are granted Str +3 and Def +3 during combat.

abilities.name: Dead Man's Hand
abilities.description: Enemies within the user's movement range cannot target allies.

abilities.name: Sibling Bond A
abilities.description: While within 2 spaces of Amalia, user's attacks inflicts 2 extra damage

abilities.name: Sibling Bond B
abilities.description: While within 2 spaces of Oskar, user reduces damage taken by 2.

abilities.name: Oskar's Sibling Bond
abilities.description: While within 2 spaces of Amalia, user's attacks inflicts 2 extra damage

abilities.name: Amalia's Sibling Bond
abilities.description: While within 2 spaces of Oskar, user reduces damage taken by 2.

abilities.name: Wrathful Empathy
abilities.description: An any ally within 3 spaces has HP ≤ 50%, grants +4 Mag and +4 Dex

abilities.name: Hesitant Prodigy (Debuff)
abilities.description: If the user is within 1 space of an ally, attacks deal 4 less damage, but 4 more damage otherwise

abilities.name: Hesitant Prodigy (Buff)
abilities.description: If the user is within 1 space of an ally, attacks deal 4 less damage, but 4 more damage otherwise

abilities.name: Brittle Bones
abilities.description: Inflicts Def -2 and Res -2 when attacked, but grants +4 Spd,

abilities.name: Zephyr
abilities.description: This unit always attacks first, even when attacked.

abilities.name: Painless
abilities.description: When a non-adjacent enemy initiates combat, -4 damage taken.

abilities.name: Bond of Silence
abilities.description: (Ryan L.: I didn't know how to adapt this one. ThatBardBoi, PM me when you decide how this works.)

abilities.name: Weight -5
abilities.description: The combained Weight of equiptment is reduced by 5.

abilities.name: Umbral Leech
abilities.description: Unit absorbs HP from phantoms.

abilities.name: Manifest Phantom
abilities.description: Unit births phantoms

abilities.name: Summon
abilities.description: Grants access to Summon. If unit has already learned Summon, mulitplies its uses per battle by 2x.

abilities.name: Bestowal
abilities.description: User's equipped abilities, excluding personal and class abilities, are also equipped by any phantom the user summons. Phantom's skills are equal to summoner's skills.

abilities.name: Immaterial
abilities.description: User's movement type is flight, but user does not take effective damage from being a flyer.

abilities.name: Retention
abilities.description: Items in the user's inventory disappear when defeated and reappear when resummoned.
